meanings.definition: The quality or state of being elegant, stylish, or sophisticated.
meanings.sent1: Her poshness was evident in the way she carried herself at the party.
meanings.sent2: The hotel's poshness was reflected in its luxurious decor and impeccable service.
meanings.sent3: Despite her attempts to downplay her poshness, her refined manners always gave her away.
meanings.sent4: The garden party exuded poshness, with guests sipping champagne and nibbling on delicate canapés.
meanings.sent5: The poshness of the event left a lasting impression on all attendees.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being upper-class or wealthy.
meanings.sent1: His poshness was evident in his designer suits and expensive watch collection.
meanings.sent2: The mansion's poshness was a symbol of the family's wealth and status in the community.
meanings.sent3: Despite his humble beginnings, he quickly adapted to the poshness of his new social circle.
meanings.sent4: The yacht exuded poshness, with its gleaming exterior and lavish interior furnishings.
meanings.sent5: The poshness of the neighborhood was a stark contrast to the simplicity of his upbringing.
